settings.title: Send it #plasticfree
settings.text: KANKAN is proud to partner with Flexi-hex, a Cornish company equally motivated to make a big impact on removing single-use plastic from the oceans. Each starter set arrives in it's own flexihex box, making the 'unboxing' really lux, but totally compostable and plastic-free.

settings.caption: Love this light filled shot from the guest bedroom @theoldhouseinthefields
I finally got around to taking photos of our bathroom refurb. It’s taken a while to get it finished, including re-painting the walls because I didn’t like the first colour we chose 🤦🏻‍♀️
Happy wallpaper to lift your mood through the mid week hump!
This photo is a fav. The lovely Cordelia + KANKAN⁠ 😊 😊 😊
On wednesdays we wear Pink! Is that a thing? Not sure, but wanted to share this shot of our tiny pink powder room as a mid week boost!

settings.title_collection: Shop our plastic-free, refillable body care
settings.desc_collection: Choose a single can of body, hand or baby wash or pick a bundle and save. Mix our washes with a three- or six-can multi pack.

settings.item_des: All natural ingredients, 100% essential oils. Luxurious soaps that are gentle on you, waterways and the planet.
There are ready-made solutions that we can use today. Resources are finite, but our cans can be recycled forever ♻︎

settings.item_title: Every shower is an act of good
settings.item_des: Luxuriate in the knowing that you are planting a forest as you wash. We plant a tree with every can sold.

settings.section_title: Waste not, want not. The solution is good, green & circular.

settings.content: “This, by the way, is not a gimmick, the lemongrass & juniper body wash is a divine morning pick-me-up”
"Perhaps the coolest refill brand we've ever seen"
“This sustainable body wash will transport you to plastic-free heaven”
"I was delighted to discover KANKAN which sells its range of botanical hand, baby and body washes in fizzy drink-style cans."

settings.review_content: Gorgeous bottle, soap and packaging! Thanks for making it easier to go plastic free!

I love this body wash. I pop one squirt onto a sponge and it lathers up beautifully which means that it will last for ages. It is made with all natural products and I love the fact that I'm doing my bit for Mother Earth.
This is honestly the most gorgeous offering. Ethical, sustainable, delicious-smelling and stylish. Our bathroom and kitchen has never smelt (or looked) so good in the hand-washing department!

settings.title: How does it work?
settings.description:
1. Pick one of our Starter Sets 1 or 2 - they include our 'Forever Bottle' and your first refill can(s). Or use a bottle of your own and go straight for our refills.

2. Crack the can, and pour into your bottle. Use your curb-side recycling bin to recycle your infinitely recyclable can.

3. Our refills last on average one month. You can re-up your cans by ordering here - starting from £12 per can.

settings.item_des: Quality naturally derived soaps that perform. Good looking dispensers that compliment all bathrooms.
Delivered to you in post-consumer paper packaging. Reuse it, Compostable home or use road-side recycling.
“A little goes a long way”. Plant-based soaps only ever fragranced with 100% essential oils.

settings.review_content: The packaging and design is so clever, a can of hand wash, lovely glass bottles and a hand written message all arrived speedily and well packaged. All environmentally friendly too, which is why I ordered originally. The product itself smells wonderful, you don’t need much of it to get a good lather and a thorough hand wash.

settings.name_author: Smells Amazing and love the concept
settings.review_content: I love all their products, they smell amazing, come beautifully packaged and are really well priced. I have bought these as many presents.

What a fantastic concept and product, brilliantly executed. The scent is so delicious that I am still sniffing the empty can ! Can't wait to run out of other products so i can order from the rest of the range, and I know what everyone who has birthday / housewarming / anything will be getting from now on.

I was given a Kankan starter set as a gift and I love it. So good to have a quality hand soap with a great perfume and it’s kind to my skin. I’m always looking for reusable products too so this ticked all the boxes. I’m now buying it as a gift for my sister.

Overall, I like the product a lot. The smell is really nice - refreshing and zesty without being too overpowering - and the glass bottle you get with the starter set is very sleek. I will be buying more of these as Christmas presents for my eco-conscious friends and family.

This order was for my friend. As a user of KANKAN myself I knew this particular friend would not only appreciate the product but also the environmental element of your business. She was indeed delighted and I thank you for getting it to her with the message in tins for her birthday. Thank you!

settings.title: Join us on our Suddy Float this Friday & Saturday
settings.text:
Bringing the cheer whilst we do our last hand deliveries of the year, we are hoping to see you on the way. Join us at the below places for a carol or two, bubbles (for both adults and kids) and the opportunity to pick up some last minute gifts.

- Place your orders before Thursday and we'll drop them to your door.

- Locals, take 10% off for float deliveries by using code SUPER_KAN

- Non-locals, tag your friends in the hood on our instagram posts for a chance to deliver them an early Christmas treat.

- If you see us - snap away! We'd love to see ourselves in action!

settings.subtitle: Introducing London artist and cold water swimmer, Rob Lowe (aka Supermundane)
settings.text: Supermundane is a graphic designer and artist working with line, colour and optical illusion and a heavy dose of humour. He has designed some of the most beautiful magazines around, including children's mag Anorak and food mag Fire & Knives. He has worked on large scale commissions such as the Leeds train station and product collaborations with Made.com as well as books and zines on numerous topics. We are so very excited that he agreed to work on our supersoap project this year for our Christmas launch. We asked him some questions about his work and his life you can read more about him here >>

settings.title: Corporate Gifting with KANKAN
settings.text:
Colleagues and clients alike will see the care and gratitude you have when gifting them with our range of products. We take great pride in offering a corporate service that can be shaped according to your needs and the gratitude and appreciation you have for your team and clients.

Our aromatic personal care products will be appreciated by almost any recipient. From your team that have had to navigate a tricky 18 months, to a work weary client or a parent juggling, we can tailor a gift that will be appreciated long after receipt. Not only that, we can deliver these direct to your nominated doorstep.
 
Let us help you through the tedium of having to shop, our knowledgeable staff are pleased to offer detailed advice about our range of products and gift packs available.

settings.title: Pricing & Delivery
settings.text:
All prices indicated online are retail prices. Reductions are available depending on the volume of the order.

We offer complimentary delivery to your chosen address.

KANKAN is a luxurious start to refill and reuse that is a revelation in its simplicity and quality. A Starter Set makes a perfect gift - it includes a glass 'Forever bottle' and your first refill can of soap.

Did you know that -

🌱 We plant a tree with every can sold.

We also include -

A hand written note to include in your gift to make it extra special for the receiver.

They are presented in unique Flexihex packaging. It's #plasticfree and looks beautiful.

settings.title: Shop our starter sets as gifts
Or contact us for gifting advice and bulk ordering

settings.title: Come Work With Us
settings.text:
KANKAN's mission is to offer a frictionless circular solution to personal care that brings all the joy and none of the waste.

By reinventing our rituals around our personal care routines, we elevate the experience and excite us into behaviour change that benefits both the customer and the planet.

settings.title: Tell me more!
settings.text: We are recruiting for a resourceful Customer service/ Operations All-rounder here >>

settings.title: Why join us?
settings.text:
We are a thriving business with big ambitions and a clear path to growth.

More importantly, we are a mission-first business that offers real change now, and solutions that have been tested in the market showsing that people want and love KANKAN.

settings.title: Come and explore our full range

settings.item_des:
▶︎ Closed loop system

▶︎ We ship it plastic-free

▶︎ Each can plants a tree

▶︎ Carbon positive

Besides providing a natural pep and good mood, lemongrass oil supports skin with anti-oxidants and anti-inflammatory kicks. Juniper tightens muscles (I know!) which gives a smooth, supple firm skin and form.

Hard working hands need soothing mandarin oil which helps brighten the skin, reduce irritation, diminish the appearance of scars and age spots and minimize stress and wrinkles. Sage calms skin and mood.

Chamomile - a wonder ingredient that help soothe no matter what the age - Whether it's irritation, or any other skin concerns. Lavender is both soothing and relaxing. If you aren't a baby, you'll soon be sleeping like one.

and we'd be showering in the wilds.

settings.title: KANKAN Gift Voucher
settings.text: Receive it directly in your inbox so you can gift it directly. Perfect for the running late, short of time or the indecisive.

settings.subtitle: CREATES SERIES
settings.title: Smile Plastics x KANKAN
settings.text: At Smile Plastics, has two main goals. Firstly, they want to create the most beautiful circular plastics in the world - 100% recycled and 100% recycled materials. Secondly, they want to challenge ideas about 'waste' and the system that creates it. Smile has been at the cutting edge of circular design since 2014.

settings.title: Introducing KANKAN Creates.
settings.text:
We are thrilled to be partnering with our friends at SGW Lab, Smile Plastics and Homework this Christmas.

By joining forces with some of the most beautiful niche homeware brands, we have created a collection of gifts that will be the envy of the tree - all design led, sustainable solutions for the modern home.

settings.subtitle: CREATES SERIES
settings.title: Homework x KANKAN
settings.text: Natural skincare and toxin-free home fragrances inspired by traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) are what Homework are about.

settings.subtitle: Creates Series
settings.title: SGW LAB x KANKAN
settings.text:
SGW Lab is a ceramic studio which was founded by artist Yuta Segawa in 2018.

The mission of SGW Lab is to think about the significance of craftsmanship in the context of William Morris.

settings.subtitle: KANKAN Starter Sets
settings.title: Gift a life improver.
settings.text:
KANKAN makes a sustainable lifestyle shift feel better than what has come before.

Better for you.

Better for Mother E.

settings.subtitle: The CIRCLE
settings.title: Introducing our ambassador program
settings.text:
At KANKAN, we like to keep things circular, even down to our community. That’s why we’d like to invite you to be a part of our Circle.

The KANKAN Circle is a community of users that share in the joy of using KANKAN and wish to spread the message of how great a low waste life can be.

settings.title: So, How Does It Work?
settings.text:
We invite you to submit your interest and level of participation you want to engage in. 

There are many ways you can get involved, from participating in our R&D groups that provide feedback on new products and innovations, to sharing your unique code with friends and family and all benefiting in a loyalty discount.

People that have an online community can share further and benefit from complimentary products and early insights on new product drops and a 10% revenue share on all sales generated. 

On successful registration, you will be eligible for some of the opportunities below. How much you lean in to the community, the more you get back.

settings.title: So, How Does It Work?
settings.text:
We invite you to submit your interest and level of participation you want to engage in.

There are many ways you can get involved, from participating in our R&D groups that provide feedback and thoughts on new products and innovations, to sharing your unique code with friends and family and all benefiting in a loyalty discount. People that have an online community can share further and benefit from complimentary products and early insights on new product drops and a 10% revenue share on all sales generated.

On successful registration, you will be eligible for some of the opportunities below. How much you lean in to the community, the more you get back.

settings.title: So, what do you get?
settings.text:
All new members will receive a welcome pack of our Starter Set 2, their unique 15% code to use, and an outline of some of the other ways we can collaborate. 

These might look like -

Invitation to feedback on new product developments

Gifted products to help promote key events 

Invites to pop ups, and meet ups

Early access to try new products pre launch

We’ll share our KANKAN perks with other aligned businesses

10% revenue on sales generated

settings.title: Bringing the sunshine again
settings.subheading: LF Markey returns for one short burst

settings.text:
Take the opportunity to grab one of our Near Perfect bottles today.

With all manufacturing there are some imperfections - these are slight and small but by selling these as Near Perfect it allows us to reduce our waste by finding homes for our perfectly useful by imperfect stock.

settings.title: Meet Louise, wonder woman behind LF MARKEY & MEADOWS
settings.text: If you are a colour loving woman that values practical, elegant clothing, then LF Markey would be a brand on your radar. The gorgeous bold utilitarian style has single handedly reinvented the boiler suit as the chic uniform of choice. Read more about Louise here.

settings.text_2:
Two washes delivered every month for set durations of either 3, 6 or 9 months.

First delivery includes two complimentary glass Forever Bottles.

Starting from £72, it's a beautiful generous gift that will keep on giving joy well into the future.

settings.subtitle: Perfectly imperfect
settings.text:
Manufacturing globally is estimated to be worth $40 trillion (over 50% of the worlds GDP)

Of that, 20% globally is deemed waste in the form of economical, and physical waste. Some is inevitable, but a lot can be reduced.

Oversupply, transportation of goods, inventory and management, and defective goods are just some of the areas of concern.

settings.title: As seen in Style Magazine
settings.text:
Our Near Perfect bottles are totally useable, have no functional flaws. They have small dents, printing blur or imperfection in the print.

As a top trend for 2022, hero-ing the wonky and imperfect is the future, and we're so happy to be mentioned as one of the champions of this movement.

settings.title: But, don't just take our word for it...
settings.testimonial_1: I have been delighted with my ‘near perfect’ order - & honestly can’t spot any flaws! and the product just smells divine - it truly makes every wash feel luxurious. thank you so much, KanKan, you are breaking boundaries & totally smashing it! X
settings.testimonial_2: This isn’t just ‘Near Perfect’ it’s Perfect— with a bottle of the gorgeous hand wash beside every sink and wash basin in my house. Would love some equally sustainable hand cream to go with it...

settings.text:
At KANKAN, we are conscious of our impact and review our supply chain. We do this by -

✔️ Working with local suppliers - reducing wasteful transportation & time

✔️ Do small runs of small collections. This helps manage oversupply and waste.

✔️ Demonstrate the value of our factory seconds and find homes for our 'near perfect' items.

settings.subtitle: 1. DESIGN OUT WASTE
settings.text:
We only make products we deem essential.

All products are made with ingredients that are biodegradable, grey water safe and are not harmful to people or planet.

We continue to find value in bi-products and waste materials.

settings.subtitle: 2. Keep Materials In Use
settings.text:
We aim to help convert people to a life of refill and reuse

We use circular resources in our packaging

We design products with consideration to their 'end of life'.

(to find out about our Near Perfect Sales, sign up to our newsletter here)

settings.subtitle: 3. Regenerate natural systems
settings.text:
One tree planted with every can sold.

We use only accredited and gold standard partners that are working with community led organisations.

Impact grows with our growth.

settings.subtitle: KANKAN CREATES IS LIVE
settings.title: Christmas Gifting
settings.text: Unique gift sets are now available. Shop our KANKAN range with our favourite homeware brands this Christmas to provide the very best in sustainable gifting.

settings.code: <iframe frameborder="0" border="0" cellspacing="0" id="tpWidget" width="442px" height="153px" title="Treepoints widget" src="https://widget.treepoints.green?company_slug=kankan&color=true&layout=wide&data=treesOnly"></iframe>

settings.subtitle: WE 💚  THE CAN
settings.text: Let us list the many ways we love this iconic object.

settings.title_1: Not all recycling is created equal
settings.text_1: Saying things are recyclable, doesn't make them so. Plastics really only have a recycling lifecycle of 2 x before they're doomed to landfill. Same goes for paper, the fibres becoming too short to bind.
settings.title_2: A true circular resource has real value
settings.text_2: Metals have the ability to be recycled infinitum without losing materiality. This makes them the most valuable item in your curb side recycling. So much so, that it helps fund other collections.

settings.text_1: We have the means to recycle every can in the UK. This seems logical, right? But this isn't the case for many 'recyclable' packaging. Often waste streams are the missing link towards a circular system of use.
settings.title_2: What more can we do with a can?
settings.text_2: The can is a design icon. We are building on its brilliance and bringing it into a new category of use. And with that we get to play with all the fantastic systems and accessories that come with it. Vending anyone?

settings.subtitle: #spotthedifference
settings.text:
Small dents, and imperfections are part of the manufacturing process. In our commitment to close the loop, we're offering all our perfectly imperfect bottles at 20% off. We dare you - can you spot the difference?

FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY

settings.title: Save 50% off Near Perfect Starter Sets.
settings.text: Do something good for you and the planet. Made from all natural ingredients and infinitely recyclable.

settings.code:
Our mission

KANKAN's ambition is to make refills mainstream. We hope that by making refills more convenient, it helps broaden the appeal and reduces our consumption for single-use plastics in the home.

We need politicians, industry, designers and makers to consider end of life - both in material design and products. We need to cherish more that which we have already and make things last longer.

All life has impact, but let's make it a positive one. Live well, but don't be greedy.

It's like the old sages say and what really is common sense: what goes around, comes around.
E&M

settings.title: Why KANKAN is better
settings.text_1: All our products are vegan, without palmoil and cruelty-free. Our natural fragrances and oils fill your home with a pleasant scent and offer skin healing benefits.
settings.text_2: Our washes come in a metal can instead of a plastic bottle. They can be recycled forever - and it's easy too! Just throw them in your curbside recycling bin.
settings.text_3: From our ingredients to our packaging, we make sure to reduce our environmental impact. With KANKAN you can enjoy high quality body care guilt-free.

settings.text_1: All our products are vegan, without palmoil and cruelty-free. Our natural fragrances and oils fill your home with a pleasant scent and offer skin healing benefits.
settings.text_2: Our washes come in a metal can instead of a plastic bottle. They can be recycled forever - and it's easy too! Just throw them in your curbside recycling bin.
settings.text_3: From our ingredients to our packaging, we make sure to reduce our environmental impact. With KANKAN you can enjoy high quality body care guilt-free.
